mapper.select: select g.grade_no as "gradeDTO.grade_no", g.grade_name as "gradeDTO.grade_name", u.user_no, u.user_id, u.user_name, u.user_email, u.user_age, u.user_gender, u.user_phone, u.user_address, u.user_joindate from t_grade g inner join t_user u on g.grade_no = u.grade_no where user_no = #{user_no}
